query:
SELECT
            COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(m.data_size, m.expected_data_size)), 0) as data_size,
            COALESCE(SUM(m.metadata_size), 0) as meta_size
        FROM
            metadata m
        INNER JOIN
            buckets b ON b.id = m.bucket_id
        WHERE
            b.account_id = $1 AND m.state IN ('current', 'outdated', 'pending');
